In England, in the seven days to 20 April, there were 13,746 new confirmed cases (24.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 13 April, there were 15,874 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 13% (2,128 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 25 April is 3,848,742 (6,837.7 cases per 100,000 population).
